data.name: SettingsPage_SendCrashInformation_Description
data.value: Our main goal is to provide an error free application. But we don't know if this application works correctly on every device. So please inform us about errors in the application by sending crash data. No private information will be sent.

data.name: SettingsPage_SendUsageInformation_Description
data.value: Help to improve application updates by sending anonymous user data. No private information will be sent.

data.name: SettingsPage_ShowUnreadMessages_Description
data.value: If you put this application on the main screen on your phone as a live tile, you will receive information about unread messages.

data.name: SupplementChooserViewModel_ErrRetrieveSupplements
data.value: Cannot retrieve supplement list. Please try later.

data.name: SettingsPage_ContentLanguage_Description
data.value: Allows to change the applicaion language. Default means, that language will be taken from the system.

data.name: SettingsPage_CopyValuesForSet_Description
data.value: Turn on if you want the number of repeats and weight to be copied when you add the next set.

data.name: SettingsPage_RetrieveMonthsNumber_Description
data.value: The number of months from which the calendar entries will be downloaded from the server. The program will automatically download entries from the current and previous month.

data.name: SettingsPage_SortExercisesBy_Description
data.value: Determines if whole exercise name or a shortcut is to be displayed in strength workout and when browsing workout plans.

data.name: PeoplePage_NoFavoritesMsg

data.name: PeoplePage_NoFriendsMsg

data.value: This application allows you to only view the blog content. To modify it, please use PC version.

data.name: CardioSetPage_StartButton_Description
data.value: Hit the start button to begin your cardio session. Press stop when you're done and the total session time will be recorded. You can also set this time manually.

data.value: Please specify what features you would like to have enabled. At any time you can change these options in Settings page.

data.name: FeatureConfirmationControl_PrivacyInfo
data.value: No personally identifiable information will be sent in usage and crash reports. We encourage you to enable all options. By doing this you help us to improve the application.

data.name: TrainingPlanEntryPage_NoSets
data.value: For this exercise there are no sets defined.

data.name: WorkoutPlanViewControl_ErrMustAddPlanToFavorites
data.value: You must add this plan to favorites first.

data.name: SettingsPage_CopySetsModeTitle
data.value: copy sets data to the new entry

data.name: SettingsPage_CopySetsMode_Description
data.value: Defines the way how strength training entry will be copied or how workout plan will be used in our calendar.

data.name: SettingsPage_CopySetsMode_WithoutSetsData
data.value: Without sets reps and weight values

data.name: SettingsPage_AutomaticCacheRefresh_Description
data.value: This setting determines how often application will update the cache of exercises, supplements and workout plans. Please keep in mind that you always can refresh it manually.

data.name: SettingsPage_RemovePictureCache_Description
data.value: Removes all photos, tips&tricks, exercises, supplements, workout plans and training days from the cache. After this application will retrieve those data when it is needed.

data.name: ForgotPasswordControl_PasswordHasBeenSent
data.value: New password will be sent. Check your email.

data.name: ForgotPasswordControl_Description
data.value: Enter your username or email address and press Ok button. New password will be sent on your email.

data.name: SynchronizationPage_QQuitQuestionWhenSyncing
data.value: Synchronization is in progress. Do you want to cancel it?

data.name: CreateProfilePage_AcceptLicenceDescription
data.value: By clicking Create button you accept Terms of Service and Privacy Policy

data.name: StrengthWorkoutPage_NoMoreTrainingsLoaded
data.value: There are no more loaded trainings.

data.name: MoreFeaturePage_Description
data.value: For more great features you can download BodyArchitect client for Windows. This is free application which has more features like: Adding new exercises Creating workout plans Generating reports A6W workout module Supplements routines More features for instructors Visit our website:

data.name: ErrUnhandledErrorOccured
data.value: Unhandled error occured during this operation.

data.name: SettingsPage_ShowSystemTray_Description
data.value: When you turn this on, system tray (showing the current time and the battery) will be shown at the top of the most pages in the application.

data.name: SettingsPage_MsgRestartToApplySettings
data.value: You must restart the application to apply new language.

data.name: MessageOfflineModeDescription
data.value: Application is now in offline mode and this means that you are not connected to the server. This mode has many limitations, but still you can add entries to your calendar. They will be saved in the local storage. Later when you will connect to the server, you must perform synchronization.

data.name: StrengthTrainingItemOptionsPage_Equipment_Description
data.value: Specifies how you perform the exercise. If you do it in "standard" way, then choose "default". Other options should be used only in exceptional situations. Only exercises with default equipment are included in the personal records.

data.name: StrengthTrainingOptionsPage_MyPlaces_Description
data.value: My Places allow you to specify where (what gym) you have your workout. Later you can generate reports using trainings from specific gym only.

data.name: ProfilePage_Notification_FavoriteCalendarChanged
data.value: when person you follow has added entry to the calendar

data.name: ProfilePage_Notification_Social
data.value: about all social events, like friendship invitations, favorite profile deleted, etc

data.name: ProfilePage_Notification_SomeoneCommentYourItem
data.value: when someone has commented your day

data.name: ProfilePage_Notification_VotedYourItem
data.value: when someone has voted on your workout plan, exercise or supplements def.

data.name: StrengthTraining_MsgIncorrectSetsValidation
data.value:
Program has detected some sets with probably incorrect values. Press OK to save them or Cancel to skip.
Incorrect sets:

data.name: ProfilePage_AllowComments_Description
data.value: Choose, if you want other users to comment on your entries in the calendar. This is the default setting for new entries only. Of course, you can change the possibility of commenting on for each day in the calendar separately.

data.name: BlogViewModel_CommentsDisabled
data.value: Comments are disabled for this day

data.name: ErrCommentsAreDisabled
data.value: Comments are disabled for this day

data.name: AccountTypePage_MyPoints_Description
data.value: Using higher account types will cost you appropriate number of points. In accounts description you will find info about required number of points for every day of using this account.

data.name: UpgradeAccountControl_InstructorAccountMessage
data.value: This feature is available in Instructor account only. Click the link bellow to see what great features you get after upgrading your account.

data.name: UpgradeAccountControl_PremiumAccountMessage
data.value: This feature is available only in Premium or Instructor account. Click the link bellow to see what great features you get after upgrading your account.

data.name: AccountTypePage_BasicAccount_Description
data.value: Totally free account, which gives you an access to the most of the programs features. You dont need anything more to start your professional workout log. Join the best bodybuilders all over the world!

data.name: AccountTypePage_ErrNotEnoughPoints
data.value: You don't have enough points to upgrade your account. Buy some and try again.

data.name: AccountTypePage_InstructorAccount_Description
data.value: If you are a fitness instructor and have your training classes or personal trainings, then Instructor account is created just for you. Create your own customers database and activities schedule. Additionally every customer can have professional workout log. From now you have access to all trainings of your customer at anytime, anyplace. You may also generate many useful reports (charts) from your customers logs.

data.name: AccountTypePage_PremiumAccount_Description
data.value: Do you want to be the best in your training? Do you want your training be more effective? Do you know that workout log is the one of the best tools for design a perfect body? Premium account gives you access to all features of BodyArchitect (except tools designed especially for fitness instructors). You will find a lots of additional features and smaller improvements, which are created to enhanced your user's experience of the application and make your trainings more effective.

data.name: AccountTypePage_QChangeAccountToHigher
data.value: Do you want to change an account type?

data.name: AccountTypePage_QChangeAccountToLower
data.value: Changing account type to lower will cost you the following amounts of points: {0}. Are you sure you want to continue?

data.name: BodyInstructorPage_MoreMsg
data.value: For more options like creating activities, your schedule or customer groups, please download BodyArchitect for PC

data.name: BodyInstructorPage_NoCustomersMsg
data.value: No customers yet. Use BodyArchitect for PC to create some customers.

data.name: CustomerInfoPage_MsgNoMeasurements
data.value: Customer doesn't have any measurements yet

data.name: CalendarPage_EntriesNotRetrieved
data.value: Entries for this month are not retrieved yet.

data.name: ErrLicence
data.value: This option is not available in your account.

data.name: Feature_Basic_A6WInCalendar_Description
data.value: Very hard training for abs. There are no too many people who finished it but who cares? If you want to have a nice 6 pack, you must have a strong motivation. BodyArchitect will help you to finish this training but it will not do it for you. Join to the elite group of people who did it!

data.name: Feature_Basic_AccessToOtherUsersCalendar_Description
data.value: Do you always want to know how other bodybuilders workout? Do you think that this knowledge would help you with your training? If the answer is yes, then use BodyArchitect to have access to workout log of other users. Additionally you can comment their entries or give them some tips if needed!

data.name: Feature_Basic_BlogInCalendar
data.value: Tell your thought in the blog

data.name: Feature_Basic_BlogInCalendar_Description
data.value: Share your thoughts with others about your each workout. Explain to newbies how to train properly. BodyArchitect gives you a possibility to have an unlimited number of entries in your blog.

data.name: Feature_Basic_ExercisesDatabase_Description
data.value: Large exercise database includes almost all major exercises with description. Its complete solution for the novice bodybuilder. You need more? Consider a Premium or Instructor account, which allows you to create your own exercises and modify existing one using feature called Equipment.

data.name: Feature_Basic_ExercisesRecords_Description
data.value: BodyArchitect automatically tracks your personal records for each exercise. To make this works, you need to enter full set information (with repetitions and weight) and set cannot be mark as Muscle failure. If you have more than 30 strength training entries in your calendar, then your records will be public and you will be able to compare it with other users.

data.name: Feature_Basic_MeasurementsInCalendar_Description
data.value: How do you know if your workout is good and gives you best results? One of the best way to know this is to measure your body (eg measuring biceps, chest circumference, etc). If you do this regularly (eg every month) and put them in your workout log, you will be able to analyze how effective your training is. Remember the numbers do not lie!

data.name: Feature_Basic_SearchUsers_Description
data.value: There are millions of people like you around the world, for whom fitness is a passion. They spend many hours on the gym and the rest time they think about it. Meet other bodybuilders, make connections and share experiences.

data.name: Feature_Basic_SupplementsCycleDefinitions_Description
data.value: You have bought some supplements but no idea how to use them? Or maybe you would like to know how other bodybuilders join supplements to achieve better results? BodyArchitect gives you access to supplements routine databases. Are you interested in creating your own routine? You need Premium or Instructor account for this.

data.name: Feature_Basic_SupplementsInCalendar_Description
data.value: Supplements are an integral part of many bodybuilders. Note your nutritions usage in the workout log to be able to analyze what products have positive effects on your workout. BodyArchitect allows you to note all important data like dosage and time.

data.name: Feature_Basic_UnlimitedEntriesInCalendar_Description
data.value: Your workout log is unlimited. Seriously! You can take measurements, workout and write a blog every day. Your notes can be very detailed. Do everything you need to increase your productivity and effectiveness.

data.name: Feature_Basic_WorkoutPlansDatabase_Description
data.value: Training plan is what every advanced bodybuilder should know and use. Now you have and access to a large database of training plans created by other users. If you want to create your own training plan and share it with others, you need Premium or Instructor account.

data.name: Feature_Instructor_CalendarForCustomers_Description
data.value: For every customer (standard or virtual) you can have a workout log and generate reports from it. You have access to all required data of your customers at any time. This is an ideal solution for personal trainers.

data.name: Feature_Instructor_Customers
data.value: Customers database with all important information

data.name: Feature_Instructor_Customers_Description
data.value: You can have unlimited number of customers (standard or virtual). What is a virtual client? It represents a group of people like women, student, policeman, etc. In addition, you can group your customers, making it easier to manage them.

data.name: Feature_Instructor_ScheduleEntries_Description
data.value: Do you have a lot of activities in the week? Do you write reservations for your customers in a piece of paper? Its time to change this. BodyArchitect allows you to create a schedule including customer reservations, track their presence, as well as payments.

data.name: Feature_Premium_AddEntriesInFuture_Description
data.value: With Basic account you could add entries to your workout log in the past and to the present day. If you need to add entries in the future (eg, planned workouts), you need Premium or Instructor account for this.

data.name: Feature_Premium_CreatingExercises_Description
data.value: Basic Account gives you access to a huge database of exercises. But we know that advanced bodybuilders want to use their own exercises. Premium or Instructor account allows you to create any number of exercises. You can also add other users exercises to favorites and use them in your calendar.

data.name: Feature_Premium_CreatingSupplementsDefinitions_Description
data.value: With this option, you can create your own supplements routine and use it in your calendar (as supplements cycle). Additionally you will be able to publish your routines to share them with others.

data.name: Feature_Premium_CreatingWorkoutPlans_Description
data.value: You will be able to create your own training plans and share them with other bodybuilders. In addition, in Premium or Instructor account you can add other users plans to your favorite list and use them as your plans.

data.name: Feature_Premium_Equipments_Description
data.value: You are in the gym and you want to do Bench Press, but the bench is occupied by someone else. So you decide to do this exercise on a machine. The problem with machines is that often you can put more weights than on barbell. In this case if you write this in your log (Bench Press with more weight), then you will see in your reports that you have a nice progress (increased weight for this exercise). But this is not true, because you did this in different way, by using different equipment. In Premium or Instructor account you can mark such exercise as done with different equipment so in reports you can show only data from standard Bench Press.

data.name: Feature_Premium_MoreFeatures_Description
data.value: Update your account and see how much improvement is waiting for you.

data.name: Feature_Premium_MyPlaces_Description
data.value: Premium account allows you to specify a gym (places) of your strength training. This is cool feature because in many cases in different gyms there are machines with different weight (the same exercise you do with different weight in each gym). In this case your reports would show you incorrect data. By using My Places you can generate report from workouts done in specific gym only.

data.name: Feature_Premium_Printing_Description
data.value: You can print any training plan or supplement routine and take it to the gym.

data.name: Feature_Premium_PrivateCalendar
data.value: Calendar and measurements can be private

data.name: Feature_Premium_PrivateCalendar_Description
data.value: If you don't want anyone to have access to your workout log or measurements, please consider upgrade your account to Premium or Instructor. They allow you to restrict access to your log. You can make it private or share with your friends only. You decide.

data.name: Feature_Premium_Reminders_Description
data.value: If you happen to forget about your training, taking supplements, or a friend's birthday, let BodyArchitect remember all of these situations and remind you about them in the most appropriate time for you.

data.name: Feature_Premium_SupportsMyTrainingsForSupplements_Description
data.value: BodyArchitect has a unique feature of creating supplements cycles. Basically, you can choose a supplements routine for your next cycle, specify when you are going to start it and BodyArchitect will fill your calendar wih appropriate supplements entries including dosage and time when you should take it. In addition, application can shows you reminder.

data.name: ErrOldApplicationVersion
data.value: You have an old version of BodyArchitect. You must update it before you can continue working with BodyArchitect.

data.name: Feature_Premium_CopyAllExercisesToNewTraining
data.value: Copy all exercises to new training

data.name: NewSetPage_StartButton_Description
data.value: Hit the start button before you start of the current set. When you finish, stop the timer. Doing so before each sets to collect such information like rest between sets and how long every set last.

data.name: Feature_Premium_StrengthTrainingTimer_Description
data.value: If you need to know rest time between sets, in Premium account you will find a timer to track such data. Simply start the timer before every set, and stop it when you finish. Simple as that but your journal will be even more valuable.

data.name: SettingsPage_TreatSuperSetsAsOne_Description
data.value: When selected, then for each superset (in strength training), if you add a new set to the one of joined exercises, then new sets will be added to rest of the exercises automatically. The same happen for delete set and for the timer (measured time will be added to all sets in the group)

data.name: Feature_Instructor_Championships_Description
data.value: This module helps you to track results of all lifters in powerlifting competitions. Now you can organize a powerlifting competition in your gym/school. Add all lifters into BodyArchitect, record all results and application will calculate final results

data.name: MeasurementsReportPage_ErrGeneratingReport
data.value: Cannot generate this report. Please try later.

data.name: Feature_Premium_Reports_Description
data.value: BodyArchitect can create charts and reports using data from your workout log. Sometimes it is very difficult to analyze raw data from your calendar and get to know if you are making progress. If you generate a chart, then you will see whether the line goes up or down. And everything will become clear.

data.name: StrengthWorkoutPage_QShowProgressForModifiedEntry
data.value: The current entry has been modified. You must save changes to see them in the report. Do you want to show report without saving changes?

data.name: MeasurementsReportPage_MsgEmptyReport
data.value: There are no data to display. Try when you fill your calendar with more data

data.name: SettingsPage_StartTimer_Description
data.value: Select, if you want to start timer automatically when you add a new strength training to your calendar. Available in Premium account only

data.name: Feature_Premium_AdvancedStrengthTraining_Description
data.value: With Premium account you can specify additional info about your strength training like rest pause and super slow in sets.

data.name: GPSTrackerPage_InfoGpsNotReady
data.value: Location services is still locating your current position. If you start now some part of your workout will not be tracked. Do you want to continue?

data.name: GPSTrackerPage_InfoLocationServiceDisabled
data.value: Location services are disabled therefore during your workout BodyArchitect will not be able to track your location and measure your distance. You can enable this in settings.

data.name: GPSTrackerPage_QRemoveEntry
data.value: Do you want to remove the current entry?

data.name: SettingsPage_LocationService_Description
data.value: Allows BodyArchitect track your location and measure the current distance during your workout. Highly recommended.

data.name: SettingsPage_RunUnderLockScreen_Description
data.value: Allows BodyArchitect track your location and measure the current distance when the application is under lock screen. Highly recommended.

data.name: TrainingDaySelectorControl_ErrSecondaryLiveTileExists
data.value: You already have this live tile

data.name: GPSTrackerPage_EntryWithoutGPSData
data.value: This entry don't have GPS coordinates stored in our system required for detailed analysis. GPS data are saved for Premium or Instructor account only.

data.name: SettingsPage_AutoPause_Description
data.value: If enabled, BodyArchitect will detect if you havent moved for 5 seconds and will pause your workout. Once you move again the workout will be resumed.

data.name: UpdateInfoControl_PromotionDescription
data.value: Great news for all users. We decided to cut prices to allow more users to have access to all features. Now you can have 360 points (1 year of Premium account) for 20$

data.name: UpdateInfoControl_PromotionDescription2
data.value: Additionally 1 day of Instructor account costs now not 3 but 2 points!

data.name: UpdateInfoControl_PromotionTitle
data.value: Biggest promotion ever. We cut prices!

data.name: Feature_Premium_NoAds_Description
data.value: BodyArchitect without advertisements has more space for showing your workout data
